Articles.Content:
Hi folks,

I', not worthy to open a thread here where the GOD OF MODS lives (seriously, you all ROCKS). 

But i wanted to share a variation of the KSA (Kerbal Space Agency.. the name 80% of us use ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif) ) flag. It's in a nasa style, hope you like it and use it for your games!

[![8rJjGdl.png](http://i.imgur.com/8rJjGdl.png)](http://i.imgur.com/8rJjGdl.png)

have a nice weekend boostars!
